thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: This was my first purchase from Town Fair Tire, so I had a lot of questions. Staff patiently answered all of them and made great recommendations. Now, compared to how I got there, driving my car feels like I'm riding a cloud. I will definitely be back.
